      • processing

        public java.util.List<Person> processing(java.util.List<LayoutToken> tokens,
                                         boolean head)
        Common processing of authors in header or citation
        Parameters:
        tokens - list of LayoutToken object to process
        head - - if true use the model for header's name, otherwise the model for names in citation
        Returns:
        List of identified Person entites as POJO.

      • trainingExtraction

        public java.lang.StringBuilder trainingExtraction(java.lang.String input,
                                                  boolean head)
        Extract results from a list of name strings in the training format without any string modification.
        Parameters:
        input - - the sequence of author names to be processed as a string.
        head - - if true use the model for header's name, otherwise the model for names in citation
        Returns:
        the pseudo-TEI training data
